channel.title: pigmentation on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in pigmentation on funPlantGenes

item.title: AN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AN2 Gene Name: ANTHOCYANIN2 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: The anthocyanin biosynthesis pathway was strongly downregulated in star petals, including its major regulator ANTHOCYANIN2 (AN2).

item.title: CGP1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A07G0703 Gene Symbol: CGP1a Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: CGP1d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D07G0770 Gene Symbol: CGP1d Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: DcMYB11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_010751 Gene Symbol: DcMYB11 Gene Name: R2R3 MYB 11 Genome: Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: Report on the discovery of DNA structural differences affecting the activity of an R2R3 MYB (encoded by DcMYB11) involved in anthocyanin regulation in carrot petiole.

item.title: FaRIPK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaRIPK1 Gene Name: red-initial protein kinase1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Silencing FaRIPK1 expression by VIGS affects ripening-related processes and corresponding gene expression.

item.title: FhPAP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FhPAP1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Freesia hybrida Functional Descriptions: The Conserved and Particular Roles of the R2R3-MYB Regulator FhPAP1 from Freesia hybrida in Flower Anthocyanin Biosynthesis.

item.title: FveMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g22020 Gene Symbol: FveMYB10 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 10 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: The R2R3-MYB transcription factor FveMYB10 is a major regulator of anthocyanin pigmentation in the red fruits of strawberry.

item.title: GhTT19
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A07G0814 Gene Symbol: GhTT19 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GmMYBA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.09G235100.1 Gene Symbol: GmMYBA2 Gene Name: MYB FAMILY TRANSCRIPTION FACTOR Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmMYBA2 and GmMYBR synergistically function in a loop to control the biosynthesis of anthocyanin in soybean MYB transcription factors GmMYBA2 and GmMYBR function in a feedback loop to control pigmentation of seed coat in soybean.

item.title: GmMYBR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.20G013000.1 Gene Symbol: GmMYBR Gene Name: MYB FAMILY TRANSCRIPTION FACTOR Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmMYBA2 and GmMYBR synergistically function in a loop to control the biosynthesis of anthocyanin in soybean MYB transcription factors GmMYBA2 and GmMYBR function in a feedback loop to control pigmentation of seed coat in soybean.

item.title: LhMYB12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LhMYB12 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 12 Genome: Species: Lilium hybrid Functional Descriptions: The novel allele of the LhMYB12 gene is involved in splatter-type spot formation on the flower tepals of Asiatic hybrid lilies.

item.title: LhMYBSPLATTER
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LhMYBSPLATTER|LhMYB12-Lat Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lilium hybrid Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor (TF) LhMYBSPLATTER|LhMYB12-Lat (formerly known as LhMYBSPLATTER|LhMYB12-Lat), identified as the major kernel protein, regulating the anthocyanin biosynthesis pathway in ‘Tiny Padhye’ of Tango Series cultivars, which the pigmentation density is high in the lower half of tepals and this patterning is of exceptional ornamental value.

item.title: MdHB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdHB1 Gene Name: homeodomain leucine zipper protein 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdHB1 down-regulation activates anthocyanin biosynthesis in the white-fleshed apple cultivar ‘Granny Smith’.

item.title: MdMYB1–2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB1–2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The effect of promoter methylation on MdMYB1 expression determines the level of anthocyanin accumulation in skins of two non-red apple cultivars.

item.title: MdMYB3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB3 Gene Name: MYB domain class transcription factor3 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: An apple MYB transcription factor, MdMYB3, is involved in regulation of anthocyanin biosynthesis and flower development.

item.title: MdSQS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSQS1 Gene Name: squalene synthase 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Virus-induced gene silencing of the two squalene synthase isoforms of apple tree (Malus × domestica L.

item.title: MdSQS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSQS2 Gene Name: squalene synthase 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Virus-induced gene silencing of the two squalene synthase isoforms of apple tree (Malus × domestica L.

item.title: PhDEF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhDEF Gene Name: PhDEFICIENS Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: Cell layer–specific expression of the homeotic MADS-box transcription factor PhDEF contributes to modular petal morphogenesis in petunia.

item.title: PyBBX24
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PyBBX24 Gene Name: B-box zinc finger protein 24 Genome: Species: Pyrus communis Functional Descriptions: Allelic variation of BBX24 (PyBBX24) is a dominant determinant controlling red coloration and dwarfism in pear.

item.title: pyp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g098110 Gene Symbol: pyp1 Gene Name: PALE YELLOW PETAL 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Identification of the carotenoid modifying gene PALE YELLOW PETAL 1 as an essential factor in xanthophyll esterification and yellow flower pigmentation in tomato.

item.title: RH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RH1 Gene Name: RED HEART1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Our findings reveal the molecular mechanism of the antagonistic gene paralogs RH1 and RH2 in determining anthocyanin leaf markings in M.

item.title: RH2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RH2 Gene Name: RED HEART2 Genome: Medicago genome sequences MtrunA17r5.

item.title: SiPSY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Seita.4G288600 Gene Symbol: SiPSY1 Gene Name: Phytoene synthase 1 Genome: Species: Setaria italica Functional Descriptions: Genome-wide association analysis identified SiPSY1 as the candidate regulatory gene for yellow grain pigment in foxtail millet.

item.title: SlAN2like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc10g086290.1.1 Gene Symbol: SlAN2like Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlMBD5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc11g068740.1.1 Gene Symbol: SlMBD5 Gene Name: methyl CpG binding domain protein 5 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato MBD5, a methyl CpG binding domain protein, physically interacting with UV-damaged DNA binding protein-1, functions in multiple processes.

item.title: SlNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlNAC1 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of tomato SlNAC1transcription factor alters fruit pigmentation and softening.
